clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Tear Evaporation Rate With Systane Complete in Dry Eye and Non-Dry Eye
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Tear Evaporation Rate With Systane Complete in Dry Eye and Non-Dry Eye

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to compare the rate of tear evaporation, measured with a novel evaporimeter, before and for one hour after an eye drop containing nano-sized oil droplets has been instilled.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline (Prior to instillation); 10, 30 and 60 minutes post instillation
primary_outcome.description: Slope of best fit line for the graph of change in relative humidity over time during a 20 second measurement of the eye after instillation of Systane Complete as compared to that prior to instillation.

arm_group.description: Instill eye drop and perform followup assessments

intervention.description: Systane Complete will be instilled and rate of evaporation assessed before and after.
